text: if any accidental spill occurs then use the sand or sawdust in your spill kit to contain the liquid and absorb it do this as soon as possible and before it spreads too far contaminates other surfaces or if on the ground penetrates below its surface scoop up the contaminated material and place it in the plastic bag that is then sealed and labeled for safe disposal later for more information about using pesticides and which PPE to use visit our website
